name: Chicken Adobo
description: Savory-sour Filipino classic braised in soy and vinegar.
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy, vinegar, garlic, pepper 30 mins.
Sear chicken; add marinade, bay leaves; simmer until tender.
Reduce sauce to desired thickness. Serve with rice.

name: Pork Sinigang
description: Sour pork soup with tamarind base and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Boil pork with tomatoes and onion until tender.
Add tamarind mix and vegetables; simmer 10 mins.
Serve hot with steamed rice.

name: Beef Kare-Kare
description: Rich peanut stew with oxtail, vegetables, and bagoong.
instructions: Boil oxtail until tender.
Make peanut sauce with peanut butter and rice flour.
Add vegetables and cooked oxtail; serve with bagoong.

name: Pancit Canton
description: Stir-fried noodles with vegetables, pork, and shrimp.
instructions: Sauté pork and shrimp; add vegetables.
Add noodles and soy sauce; stir-fry until cooked.
Serve with calamansi.

name: Chicken Tinola
description: Ginger-based chicken soup with papaya and chili leaves.
instructions: Sauté ginger and onion; add chicken and fish sauce.
Pour water; simmer until chicken is tender.
Add papaya and chili leaves; cook 5 mins.

name: Lechon Kawali
description: Crispy deep-fried pork belly, best with liver sauce.
instructions: Boil pork belly with salt until tender.
Let cool, then deep fry until golden and crispy.
Serve with liver sauce.

name: Laing
description: Taro leaves cooked in coconut milk with chili and shrimp paste.
instructions: Simmer coconut milk with garlic, onion, shrimp paste.
Add taro leaves and chili; simmer until tender.
Cook until sauce thickens.

name: Pinakbet
description: Mixed vegetables stewed in bagoong with pork.
instructions: Sauté pork with garlic and onion.
Add vegetables and bagoong; simmer until cooked.
Serve hot.

name: Lumpiang Shanghai
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with pork and vegetables.
instructions: Mix pork, carrot, onion, egg into filling.
Wrap in lumpia wrappers.
Deep fry until golden brown.

name: Halo-Halo
description: Refreshing shaved ice dessert with mixed sweets and milk.
instructions: Layer ingredients in a tall glass.
Top with shaved ice and evaporated milk.
Add ube halaya and leche flan.

name: Bicol Express
description: Spicy pork dish simmered in coconut milk and chilies.
instructions: Sauté garlic, onion, and pork.
Add coconut milk, shrimp paste, and chilies.
Simmer until pork is tender.

name: Arroz Caldo
description: Comforting rice porridge with chicken and ginger.
instructions: Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger.
Add chicken, rice, and broth; simmer until porridge consistency.
Top with garlic chips and scallions.

name: Tapsilog
description: Beef tapa with garlic fried rice and fried egg.
instructions: Cook beef tapa until tender.
Fry eggs sunny side up.
Serve with garlic rice.

name: Turon
description: Sweet banana spring rolls with caramelized sugar.
instructions: Wrap banana and jackfruit in lumpia wrapper with sugar.
Deep fry until golden brown.
Coat with caramelized sugar.

name: Kaldereta
description: Tomato-based beef stew with liver spread and vegetables.
instructions: Brown beef; add tomato sauce and liver spread.
Simmer until beef is tender.
Add vegetables and cook until done.

name: Sisig
description: Sizzling pork dish with onions, chilies, and calamansi.
instructions: Boil and grill pork parts, then chop finely.
Mix with onion, chilies, and calamansi juice.
Serve on sizzling plate with mayonnaise.

name: Bibingka
description: Rice cake baked in banana leaves, topped with cheese and salted egg.
instructions: Mix rice flour, coconut milk, and egg into batter.
Pour into lined pan; top with cheese and salted egg.
Bake until golden brown.

name: Palabok
description: Rice noodles topped with shrimp sauce, chicharon, and egg.
instructions: Cook rice noodles and set aside.
Make shrimp sauce with annatto and garlic.
Top noodles with sauce, chicharon, and egg.

name: Bulalo
description: Beef shank soup with bone marrow, corn, and vegetables.
instructions: Boil beef shank for hours until tender.
Add corn, onion, and cabbage.
Season with fish sauce and serve hot.

name: Ginataang Manok
description: Chicken stew in coconut milk with papaya and chili.
instructions: Sauté ginger, garlic, and onion; add chicken.
Pour coconut milk and simmer.
Add papaya and chili; cook until tender.
